ru.bit.torrent

Class ToolKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.bit.torrent.ToolKit

  • public class ToolKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a number of methods useful for debugging and developing programs using Bencoding methods.  This class is specifically designed to be used with edu.rutgers.cs.cs352.bt.util.Bencoder and Bencoder2.
    Author:
    Robert Moore II

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.Object o)
        Prints out Java versions of Bencoding data types.
        Parameters:
        o - the Object to print.  It must be one of the following types: @

      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.Object o,
         int depth)
        Prints the specified object with the provided depth. The depth simply indicates how much to indent.
        Parameters:
        o - the object to print
        depth - the depth of the object within another data type.

      • printString

        public static void printString(byte[] bytes,
               boolean as_text,
               int depth)
        Helper method that prints out a byte string as a series of integer or ASCII characters.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte string to print.
        as_text - true if the byte string should be printed as ASCII characters
        depth - the depth of the object within other objects, used for indenting.

      • printString

        public static void printString(java.nio.ByteBuffer byte_string,
               boolean as_text,
               int depth)
        Helper method that prints out a ByteBuffer as a series of integer or ASCII characters.
        Parameters:
        byte_string - the ByteBuffer to print.
        as_text - true if the ByteBuffer should be printed as ASCII characters
        depth - the depth of the object within other objects, used for indenting.

      • printInteger

        public static void printInteger(java.lang.Integer i,
                int depth)
        Helper method that prints out an integer.
        Parameters:
        i - the integer to print.
        depth - the depth of the object within other objects, used for indenting.

      • printList

        public static void printList(java.util.AbstractList list,

        Helper method that prints out a list.
        Parameters:
        list - the list to print.
        depth - the depth of the object within other objects, used for indenting.

        Helper method that prints out a dictionary/map.
        Parameters:
